knimeNode.name: VCFSorter
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node sorts the chromosomes of an input VCF file analogous to a given reference sequence.

fullDescription.intro: The VCFSorter sorts the chromosomes of an input VCF file analogous to a reference sequence. This step is required in order to merge two VCF files with the MergeTwoVCFs node.

tab.name: Preference page
tab.option: Set a threshold for repeated execution. Only used if HTE is enabled in the preference page.
Set the path to the reference reference sequence. This will be done automatically if the path is already defined in the preference page.

ports.outPort: Cell 0: Path to sorted VCF file.
